resources.string: Music Player is an app that fetches the music on the user\'s phone storage. It has basic functionality and no bells and whistles.
Each activity will have a Search function for which I\'ll need a SearchView view and a search interface as described in: http://bit.ly/2kzlnet
There\'s playlists for "Recently Added", "Most Played", "Recently Played" and a user\'s custom built playlist

This activity displays a list of Artists in the Music Player app. It uses the android.widget.BaseAdapter class to efficiently map the artist list to a ListView. This class and view are both things we haven\'t seen yet. I\'m getting most of the info for this app from http://bit.ly/2jD9MXq
This will have a list of albums
This will have a list of genres
